title: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB: a. The buttons are too small. b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled. c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off. d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
EB: a. The marking between the button and list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. b. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic. c. Multiple selection should be allowed, as move up/down can be applied on more than one item. d. The signature preview must be a label that wraps. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover. e. The signature preview should wrap when the text exceeds the width of the dialog. f. The button size and spacing should be consistent with the rest of the dialog. g. The dialog size should be adjusted according to the number of parameters.
